title: Coconut tofu keema curry
ingredients: ['4 tablespoons olive oil', '4 cloves garlic, pressed', '1 medium onion, minced', '400g (14 oz) extra firm tofu, diced', '450ml (16 fl oz) coconut milk', '1 tablespoon ground cumin', '1 teaspoon curry powder', '1 1/2 teaspoons ground ginger', '1 teaspoon salt', '1 tablespoon red pepper paste', '1.5L (2Â½ pints) passata', '225g (8 oz) frozen garden peas, thawed', '4 carrots, chopped']
